articles.author: Kashmira Gander
articles.title: Newborn Given Cannabis-derived Drug to Prevent Seizures and Brain Damage in World First Trial - Newsweek
articles.description: Oscar Parodi is taking part in a trial where babies are given a 30th of the usual dose of the drug.
articles.content:
A baby boy in the U.K. has become the first to join a trial investigating whether a cannabis-based drug can prevent seizures and brain damage in infants.
